name: Autonomous Vehicle AI Model Poisoning
description: Adversarial attacks against ML models to cause misclassification of objects and unsafe decisions
attack_vectors: Real-time adversarial patches on road signs
Supply chain compromise of training datasets
prerequisites: ML expertise and adversarial attack knowledge
Access to training pipeline or inference inputs
threat_intelligence_source: Gemini AI + automotive ML security research
ai_reasoning: ML models vulnerable to adversarial attacks with safety-critical consequences

name: V2X Protocol Exploitation and Traffic Manipulation
description: Exploitation of V2X communication protocols to inject false traffic information and manipulate vehicle behavior
motivation: Traffic disruption, targeted attacks, mass manipulation
attack_vectors: Cryptographic key compromise of V2X certificates
prerequisites: V2X protocol knowledge and radio equipment
ai_reasoning: V2X protocols create new attack surfaces for coordinated multi-vehicle attacks

name: Cloud-Scale OTA Supply Chain Attack
description: Compromise of cloud infrastructure to distribute malicious OTA updates to entire vehicle fleets
motivation: Mass vehicle compromise, espionage, ransom at scale
attack_vectors: Supply chain injection in OTA packages
ai_reasoning: Cloud-scale attacks can compromise millions of vehicles simultaneously

name: Sensor Fusion Data Injection Attack
description: Sophisticated attack combining multiple sensor spoofing techniques to create consistent false environmental perception
motivation: Targeted vehicle manipulation, research demonstration, assassination
attack_vectors: Coordinated LiDAR spoofing with laser systems
Camera feed manipulation through projected images
GPS spoofing combined with IMU attacks
prerequisites: Physical proximity and surveillance of target
ai_reasoning: Multi-sensor attacks can bypass individual sensor validation mechanisms

name: Privacy-Focused Data Exfiltration Campaign
description: Sophisticated data mining operation targeting vehicle data lakes for personal information and behavioral patterns
motivation: Mass surveillance, behavioral analysis, commercial intelligence
attack_vectors: Insider access to data lake systems
API exploitation for bulk data access
prerequisites: Access to vehicle data systems or APIs
ai_reasoning: Large-scale data collection creates attractive targets for privacy violations
